resources.string: In this Book, you will find the answers to the most important questions in life...
You can hide neither from the Truth nor from Wisdom. There is nothing secret on Earth which will not one day become known.
Amazing book which lifts a veil of illusions from eyes of people!
Everything in this world has a Beginning and an End. But only for those who attain the Supreme by their thoughts and deeds, the End becomes the Beginning.
This is a live encyclopedia of primordial spiritual Knowledge of the world, society, and human being.
Consciousness and Personality. From the inevitably dead to the eternally alive
It is a consequence of what happened on December 21, 2012. It is the next step after the book “AllatRa”.
Three worldly stories, wise parables enrich the reader on this path and help him in finding himself and his meaning of life.
The book about the fight on the other side of reality. The scales of Good and Evil are in hands of a human.
On the Problems and Consequences of Global Climate Change on Earth. Effective Ways to Solve These Problems
Ancient spiritual practices and meditations for those who want to know themselves.
Predictions of the future and the truth about past and present
